# Radiance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]], [[Light Spells|light]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** 60-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D); see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 122

*A bright, scintillating light shines from your body.*

For the duration of this spell*,* you emanate a bright light that undead find uncomfortable. The illumination within the area is bright, the equivalent of a *[[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]]* spell*.* Undead in the area are [[Dazzled|dazzled]] for as long as they remain in the radius and for 1d6 rounds thereafter.

*Radiance* counters or dispels any darkness spell of equal or lower level.
